sentences.sContent: The neck of the zebra was nipped by a lion.
sentences.sContent_eng: The neck of the zebra was nipped by a lion.
sentences.sCn: 狮子咬断了那头斑马的脖子。

sentences.sContent: But what if your horse suddenly grows zebra stripes?
sentences.sContent_eng: But what if your horse suddenly grows zebra stripes?
sentences.sCn: 可是如果那匹马突然长出了斑马的条纹呢？

sentences.sContent: Sixty acres of woods and ponds are home to camels, zebra, bison, water buffalo, ostrich and antelope.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sixty acres of woods and ponds are home to camels, zebra, bison, water buffalo, ostrich and antelope.
sentences.sCn: 六十英亩的森林和池塘是骆驼，斑马，野牛，水牛，鸵鸟和羚羊的家园。

phrases.pCn: [鱼]斑马鱼（一种有斑马条纹的胎生观赏鱼）

trans.tranOther: an animal that looks like a horse but has black and white lines all over its body
